attributes.action: Launch an Investigation into Elliot Morley and have him arrested for Fraud.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Elliot Morley has claimed £16,000 on a mortgage that didn't even exist.
This is clear fraud and I don't think that MP's can Buy themselfs out of the justice system, or I hope they can't.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
